attributes.review: I had a problem with this app and im pretty sure every one has the same problem as me. My phone was glitching and then my phone turn off idk what happen ,but I was very disappointed of this app.
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: As a cow I would actually rate this a -infinity out of 5 stars. When all my friends registered it turned them into pork😭 they ATE MY FRIENDS AND FAMILY. They also stole my cage and carrots. What is wrong with these people. Jeez. There is so many unnecessary glitches and confirmation thingys. GEN-Z RULES!!! (I’m 40 btw)
attributes.title: NOT WORTH IT!

attributes.review: One time my sister and i purchased water ballon kits from this store. When we got home we walked around the block and tried to sell the empty water balloons a la carte. We got grounded but we sold like 10 single balloons I think.
attributes.title: Irrelevant personal story

attributes.review: After I downloaded this app some weird alien guy came to my house and stole all MY WAFFLES 🧇😡. This is unacceptable. I then called PAW PATROL and PJ Masks to help me get my waffles back but it was to late. They told me that THIS APP contacted the alien guy👽 to steal all my waffles. Now I sleep with the bathroom door open. I will get my revenge and that’s a PROMISE !!!!!!🥊🥊🔧🧽❌❌
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP😡

attributes.review: This app is terribly designed, terribly made, terribly wrong in every way possible. This needs to be taken down and while we’re at it we should just delete this app as a whole and pretended it never existed.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: If you are looking for a app to steal all of your information and show you thousands of pics of a Cheeto this ones for you. I would not recommend it to any sane person.
attributes.title: Awful just awful

attributes.review: when i downloaded this app my entire family suddenly had covid-19, no explanation to how they would have gotten it because we are all quarantined and don’t leave the house even to go on a walk, and have been doing this since the beginning of the year. nobody has been to our house since january and we haven’t left. the app is clearly the cause and now we have to deal with medical bills and being sick
attributes.title: terrible

attributes.review: I’m not very pleased with this app. There’s a lot of hate, fear mongering, and biases going on. I thought I would just see current events going on, not his every tweet. If I wanted to see that I’ll just go to Twitter. Not good at all. Would give 0 stars if I could.
attributes.title: Not pleased

attributes.review: I’m having technical problems with the fact that he won’t acknowledge pride month! I think this app is stealing my money! For some reason the app blocks him from supporting BLM!! I’m fed up and the adds are driving me crazy🙄
attributes.title: Still no good

attributes.review: This app has sooo many malfunctions it keeps saying that our president is actually a good guy and totally not racist at all. There were a lot of bug problems and needs to be fixed right away along with the government.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE
